entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Pikangikum
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:56 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
